overview:
Kevin led Product Development, Product Management and Marketing as Vice President for Bug Labs in 2008-2009.

Joined company while product was in early development and led the organization and outside contractors (EE, ME, ID and PR firm) through product launch and commercialization. Established manufacturing relationships, processes and product sourcing in North America and Asia. Established concepts of 2nd gen product line. Participated in monthly board meetings with VC partners and changed Bug Labs business model from consumer based to enterprise based approach.

milestones.description: VP of Marketing and Product Management
